Research item for magicians.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin Byer [mailto:kbyer@...]
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 5:01 PM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Glove Of Rallos Zek

From: "Kevin Byer" <kbyer@...>

A friend of mine found a Glove Of Rallos Zek in Southern Karana on an
avocet, anyone know what its used for?

Its not a weapon, or magical, or armour that they can wear. They tried to
identify it and apparently its the "Glove Of Rallos Zek".... hmmm, love
that identify spell.

Thanks

Aban Steelsoul
Rathe Server
